title: Hybrid Vehicle Service and Repair
description: Technical course on servicing and repairing Škoda hybrid vehicles. Includes safety procedures, diagnostic tools, and repair techniques.
formatted_text:
Course: Hybrid Vehicle Service and Repair
Course ID: SKODA-004
Category: Technical
Level: Advanced
Duration: 4 days
Instructor: Ing. Martin Procházka

Description: Technical course on servicing and repairing Škoda hybrid vehicles. Includes safety procedures, diagnostic tools, and repair techniques.

Topics covered: Hybrid systems, Safety procedures, Diagnostics, Repair techniques
